purpose: Provide a comprehensive list of resources and tools related to the Eliza framework
principle: Curates and categorizes resources, tools, and projects related to the Eliza framework for easy discovery and use
reusability: Can be used as a reference for developers and researchers interested in the Eliza framework, offering links to various tools and resources
limitations: Dependent on community contributions for completeness and updates; primarily a static resource list without dynamic content
name: awesome-eliza
description: A curated list of awesome things related to eliza framework.
